name: Anstorm
description:
Anstorm is an action arcade, the goal is to survive and gain points as much as possible.
Simple and exciting gameplay, familiar to all of the classic arcade shooters!
Ideal to relax during a break!



Two game modes:
- hold out for half a minute without falling into the void, in a constantly changing maze of platforms.
- the classic survival mode, where you need to fend off the ever-growing hordes of enemies.
